languages.text: "Я... понимаю. Прощай, {name}. Желаю тебе спастись из этого логова. Моя же душа слишком долго была в плену у этого отравленного места и проросла в него. Пойду и убью кого-нибудь достойного этого".

"I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."
languages.original_text: "Я... понимаю. Прощай, {name}. Желаю тебе спастись из этого логова. Моя же душа слишком долго была в плену у этого отравленного места и проросла в него. Пойду и убью кого-нибудь достойного этого".

traits.locale_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been been trapped here for so long that it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been been trapped here for so long that it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I, uh, understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long, it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I, uh, understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long, it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je... comprends Adieu, {name}. Je vous souhaite de trouver une issue à ce nid empoisonné. Mon âme est ici depuis si longtemps qu'elle y a ancré ses racines. Je vais m'en aller et donner la mort à quelqu'un qui la mérite. »
languages.original_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."

traits.locale_text: « Je... je comprends. Adieu, {name}. Je vous souhaite de trouver une issue à ce nid empoisonné. Mon âme est ici depuis si longtemps qu'elle y a ancré ses racines. Je vais m'en aller et donner la mort à quelqu'un qui la mérite. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我……明白了。别了，{name}，希望你能从这个毒巢里逃出去。可我的灵魂已经在这里困得太久了，那些东西已经扎根了。我准备去杀一个罪有应得的家伙。”
languages.original_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."

traits.locale_text: “我，呃，我明白了。别了，{name}，希望你能从这个毒巢里逃出去。可我的灵魂已经在这里困得太久了，那些东西已经扎根了。我准备去杀一个罪有应得的家伙。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「そうか、分かった。ではさらばだ、{name}。この毒の巣から無事に脱出できるように祈っている。だが、俺の魂はあまりに長くここに閉じ込められていたせいで、すっかり根を下ろしてしまっている。そうさせた奴を、俺は殺し行くつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."

traits.locale_text: 「そうか、分かった。ではさらばだ、{name}。この毒の巣から無事に脱出できるように祈っている。だが、俺の魂はあまりに長くここに閉じ込められていたせいで、すっかり根を下ろしてしまっている。そうさせた奴を、俺は殺し行くつもりだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... verstehe. Lebt wohl, {name}. Möget Ihr aus diesem giftigen Nest entkommen. Aber meine Seele ist schon so lange hier gefangen, dass sie Wurzeln geschlagen hat. Ich werde losziehen und jemanden töten, der es verdient hat."
languages.original_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich, äh, verstehe. Lebt wohl, {name}. Möget Ihr aus diesem giftigen Nest entkommen. Aber meine Seele ist schon so lange hier gefangen, dass sie Wurzeln geschlagen hat. Ich werde losziehen und jemanden töten, der es verdient hat."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Lo... entiendo. Adiós, {name}. Ojalá encuentre una salida de este nido de víboras. Pero mi alma lleva tanto tiempo atrapada aquí que ha echado raíces. Iré a matar a alguien que se lo merezca».
languages.original_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."

traits.locale_text: «Eh... claro, lo entiendo. Adiós, {name}. Ojalá encuentres una salida de este nido de víboras. Pero mi alma lleva tanto tiempo atrapada aquí que ha echado raíces. Iré a matar a alguien que se lo merezca».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Anlıyorum... Elveda {name}. Dilerim bu zehirli inden çıkmanın bir yolunu bulursun. Benim ruhumsa burada öylesine uzun zamandır tutsak kalmış ki buraya kök salmış. Şimdi gidip ölümü hak eden birisinin canını alacağım. "
languages.original_text: "I... understand. Farewell, {name}. May you find your escape from this poisonous nest. But my soul has been trapped here for so long it has put down roots. I will go and kill someone who deserves it."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum... Elveda {name}. Dilerim bu zehirli inden çıkmanın bir yolunu bulursun. Benim ruhumsa burada öylesine uzun zamandır tutsak kalmış ki buraya kök salmış. Gidip başına gelecekleri hak eden birini öldüreyim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
